an7.5:1: "Sattimāni, bhikkhave, dhanāni. Katamāni satta? Saddhādhanaṁ, sīladhanaṁ, hirīdhanaṁ, ottappadhanaṁ, sutadhanaṁ, cāgadhanaṁ, paññādhanaṁ. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, satta dhanānīti.
an7.5:2: Saddhādhanaṁ sīladhanaṁ,hirī ottappiyaṁ dhanaṁ;Sutadhanañca cāgo ca,paññā ve sattamaṁ dhanaṁ.
an7.5:3: Yassa ete dhanā atthi,itthiyā purisassa vā;Adaliddoti taṁ āhu,amoghaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ.
an7.5:4: Tasmā saddhañca sīlañca,Pasādaṁ dhammadassanaṁ;Anuyuñjetha medhāvī,Saraṁ buddhāna sāsanan"ti.
